amendment.description: Amendment restores approximately $200 million rescinded from programs relating to the Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, Education, and Related Agencies. \ As amended by the Castle amendment (A006) $10 million was transferred from the Eisenhower program to the DARE program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to restore approximately $200 million dollars in funding to various and sundry programs. These funds are restored through offsets in other programs.

action.text: Porter amendment (A005) modified by unanimous consent. Modifications make technical and conforming corrections.
On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A005) as modified and amended Agreed to by voice vote.
